name: @mak-stack/mak-ui
description: MakUi: A developer-first NextJs theming. Unlike other design-systems, MakUi allows for as much verbosity and customization as desired. It offers simplified palette generation, intuitive tailwindcss-esque styling with integration for all HTML tags <mak.[tag]>, built-in theming, and psuedo-classes, and flexibility to use with or without MakUi's component package.
author: Sam 'Makali'i' Tanner <samuel.m.s.tanner@gmail.com> (https://www.samuel-tanner.com/)
